headline: UBS Trims Eversource (ES) Target but Sees Constructive Regulatory Progress
summary: Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy and Hold in 2026. On December 17, UBS lowered its price target on Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) to $73 from $78 and kept a Neutral rating on the shares. Analyst William Appicelli pointed to a recent filing by Eversource Energy’s NStar Gas, […]
